name: 15.0 CIVIL SPECIFICATION - TRENCHLESS METHODS
15.01 - Rock Armour Grading
DRAWING / SPECIFICATION REF.: T+T NAL Recovery Specifications: 10.4.3.1.1
SPECIFICATION DETAIL SUMMARY: Rock armour material shall be well graded as indicated on the drawings.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Poorly graded or gap graded armour rock shall not be permitted except as approved by the Engineer.
TEST SPEC AND FREQUENCY: For every section of rock armour
CONTROL TYPE I.E. CHECKSHEET / RECORDS: Rock Specifications
HOLD / WITNESS: HOLD
EXTERNAL (REQUESTED BY PS4) / INTERNAL (JFC REQUIREMENT): External
PS3 OWNER: JFC
HOLD / REVIEW / WITNESS: REVIEW
PS4 OWNER SIGN OFF: T&T
15.02 - Rock Armour - Placement
DRAWING / SPECIFICATION REF.: T+T NAL Recovery Specifications: 10.4.4.4
SPECIFICATION DETAIL SUMMARY: The placement method of armour and underlayers directly on geotextile filter fabric shall be approved by the Engineer prior to placement
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Engineer to approve methodology
TEST SPEC AND FREQUENCY: Prior to rock armour placement
CONTROL TYPE I.E. CHECKSHEET / RECORDS: Method Statement, Written Confirmation of Engineer’s Approval
HOLD / WITNESS: HOLD
EXTERNAL (REQUESTED BY PS4) / INTERNAL (JFC REQUIREMENT): External
PS3 OWNER: JFC
HOLD / REVIEW / WITNESS: HOLD
PS4 OWNER SIGN OFF: T&T
AUTHORITY HOLDPOINT
15.03 - Tolerances
DRAWING / SPECIFICATION REF.: T+T NAL Recovery Specifications: 10.4.5.2
SPECIFICATION DETAIL SUMMARY: Rock materials must be placed according to the drawings' levels, dimensions, and slopes, and the surface profile must be measured using the specified tolerances:
○ Subgrade levels: -0.1 m to +0.1 m
○ Armour underlayer thickness (average per profile): -0.1 m to +0.2 m
○ Armour rock thickness (average per profile): 0.1 m to +0.5 m
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Tolerances are adhered to
TEST SPEC AND FREQUENCY: For every section of rock material placed
CONTROL TYPE I.E. CHECKSHEET / RECORDS: QA Checksheet(s), Photos
HOLD / WITNESS: HOLD
EXTERNAL (REQUESTED BY PS4) / INTERNAL (JFC REQUIREMENT): External
